Keywords: Amazon , Deity , Teen Titans , Warrior , Young Justice
Real Name: Cassie Sandsmark
Special Powers
CHAMPION OF THEMYSCIRA: LASSO OF TRUTH: Wonder Girl may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped. // If Wonder Girl is equipped with WW80 #s002 Lasso of Truth, when using its Incapacitate all hit targets can't use damage powers until your next turn.
TITANS REBORN: When Wonder Girl is given a MOVE action, after resolutions she can use the Titans team ability as FREE.

March 25, 2022
Bobcat2022
The post-// caveat on her "Champion of Themyscira" trait is the sleeper hit: she gets FREE AoE Incap that can shut down whole teams' worth of Prob/Perplex/Outwit/Support/CCE/RCE/etc/etc. And the "Become Targets" clause of the Lasso gets around Shape Change, as long as it's not on the first person you're targeting. Truly, some long-overdue (Young) Justice for Cassie Sandsmark.
March 25, 2022
BrunoHarm
well, she has the Deity keyword, so with WOTR Mary Jane, you could bring WW TA and Titans TA to Spider family. although I prefer the 40 Point Wonder Girl from the box set. Alas no Deity keyword on that one.
